term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - resolution in gas chromatography
term.title: resolution

item.text: A characteristic of the separation of two adjacent peaks. It may be expressed according to the equation: R AB = 2 | d R B- d R A | | w B is the resolution, dR(A) and dR(B) are the retention distances (time or volume) of each eluted component A and B, and w A and w B are the respective widths of each peak at its base.

item.alttext: R AB = 2 | d R B- d R A | | w B
